fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Merge yourself with another player permanently. Together, you and people you merged with will be referred to as the Blob in this role card. This ability can be used alongside your other ability and be used in your Player Channel, despite your own attributes.
- Choose the action of one of the players in the Blob. This is subjected to your attributes of the Blob Chat.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Only one player in the Blob may submit an action per phase, no mater how many players have been added to it. The last submitted action is the one that actually gets used.
- A chat for players in the Blob will be provided for them to endlessly bicker and fight in.
- Goals and abilities are NOT changed by being added to the Blob.
- Once a player is in the Blob, they cannot submit actions in their player channel. They must use the Blob Chat instead.
- The Blob will remain even if the Black Hole dies.
- The Black Hole cannot die to being hanged.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see every living player joined with you within the Blob. The other players in the Blob will lose if this comes to pass, unless they have already fulfilled their goal.
